comment: Don't be an idiot. Illegal aliens stay as far away from government offices and agents including voting stations as they can get. If we got rid of all illegal aliens the USA would lose billions in taxes & revenues while costing less in benefits they can't receive like SNAP, WIC, SSI, SSDI, Vocational Rehabilitation, Promise, etc.
amr:
# ::snt Don't be an idiot. Illegal aliens stay as far away from government offices and agents including voting stations as they can get. If we got rid of all illegal aliens the USA would lose billions in taxes & revenues while costing less in benefits they can't receive like SNAP, WIC, SSI, SSDI, Vocational Rehabilitation, Promise, etc.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / idiot
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :domain (y / you))
      :snt2 (s / stay-01
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG1-of (l / legal-02
                        :polarity -)
                  :ARG1-of (l2 / legal-02
                        :polarity -))
            :ARG3 (r / relative-position
                  :op1 (a / and
                        :op1 (o / office
                              :mod (g / government-organization
                                    :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01)))
                        :op2 (a2 / agent

                                    :ARG1 (s2 / station
                                          :mod (v / vote-01)))))
                  :direction (a3 / away)
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG2 (f / far)
                        :ARG3 (e / equal)
                        :ARG4 (p2 / possible-01
                              :ARG1 (g3 / get-05
                                    :ARG1 p)))))
      :snt3 (l3 / lose-02
            :ARG0 (c / country
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "USA"))
            :ARG1 (m2 / multiple
                  :op1 (m3 / monetary-quantity
                        :quant 1000000000
                        :unit (d / dollar))
                  :ARG3 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (t / tax-01)
                        :op2 (r2 / revenue)))
            :condition (r3 / rid-01
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person
                        :mod (a5 / all)
                        :ARG1-of (l4 / legal-02
                              :polarity -)))
            :ARG1-of (c2 / contrast-01
                  :ARG2 (c3 / cost-01
                        :ARG1 l3
                        :ARG2 (b / benefit-01
                              :ARG1-of (r4 / receive-01
                                    :ARG0 p3
                                    :ARG1-of (p4 / possible-01
                                          :polarity -))
                              :example (a6 / and
                                    :op1 (p5 / program
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "SNAP"))
                                    :op2 (p6 / program
                                          :name (n3 / name
                                                :op1 "WIC"))
                                    :op3 (p7 / program
                                          :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "SSDI"))
                                    :op4 (p8 / program
                                          :name (n5 / name
                                                :op1 "Vietnam"
                                                :op2 "Rehabilitation"))
                                    :op5 "Promotion")
                              :op6 "Promotion")
                        :op7 (e2 / et-cetera)))))

comment: According to ICE/INS, Homeland Security & USD of Demographics, the est. no. in the report was -12.1 million but since then, especially in -18, that figure has declined to under million & we're getting fewer from our Southern border but more from over the US-Canadian border. I was unable to locate a reliable source for your figure of M.

                                    :year 18)

                  :ARG2 (a2 / and

                                          :poss w))))))
      :snt2 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (l2 / locate-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (s4 / source

comment: The word is guy's, Turk. Were you born an English speaker?. How do you tell the refugees from the illegal immigrants? The Dept. of Homeland Security report (pg. or ) is on their website. You can find all of the figures I wrote by entering USA.gov; ICE, or current illegal population in the USA but you'll get several sites. Verify facts by going to Snopes.
amr:

You can find all of the figures I wrote by entering USA.gov; ICE, or current illegal population in the USA but you'll get several sites. Verify facts by going to Snopes.

      :snt1 (w / word

                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Turk"))

                  :source (p3 / person

                                    :polarity -)))))
      :snt4 (b / be-located-at-91

                  :source (g / government-organization
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Dept."

                              :op3 "Homeland"
                              :op4 "Security"))
                  :ARG1-of (w2 / write-01

            :ARG2 (w3 / website
                  :poss g))
      :snt5 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (p4 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (f / find-01

                              :mod (a3 / all)

                  :manner (e / enter-01

                        :ARG1 (o / or
                              :op1 (u / url-entity
                                    :value "USA.gov")

                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "ICE"))
                        :op3 (p5 / population
                              :time (c2 / current)
                              :ARG1-of (l3 / legal-02
                                    :polarity -)
                              :location (c3 / country
                                    :name (n5 / name
                                          :op1 "USA"))))))
      :ARG2 (g2 / get-01

            :ARG1 (s2 / site
